item.title: Projects blog
item.description: Focus stacking rig #projects Brief: Reuse 3D printer components to learn how to make a basic mechatronic system MVP: A one axis slide for photography Requires: Control board alu frame Progress 2023-10-05 On a suggestion from a hackspace member I tried scanning the camera’s connection with wireshark. While I couldn’t connect both the laptop and the phone with the application at the same time so I can sniff a proven app, it did volunteer SSDP packages which I wasn’t able to request myself.
